set(third_party_folder "ThirdParty")

set(BUILD_SHARED_LIBS OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)

if (NOT TARGET spdlog)
    option(SPDLOG_BUILD_EXAMPLE "" OFF)
    option(SPDLOG_INSTALL "" OFF)
    option(SPDLOG_USE_STD_FORMAT "" OFF)
    add_subdirectory(spdlog)
    set_target_properties(spdlog PROPERTIES FOLDER ${third_party_folder}/spdlog)
endif ()

if (NOT TARGET glfw)
    option(GLFW_BUILD_EXAMPLES "" OFF)
    option(GLFW_BUILD_TESTS "" OFF)
    option(GLFW_BUILD_DOCS "" OFF)
    option(GLFW_INSTALL "" OFF)
    add_subdirectory(glfw)
    set_target_properties(glfw PROPERTIES FOLDER ${third_party_folder}/glfw)
    set_target_properties(update_mappings PROPERTIES FOLDER ${third_party_folder}/glfw)
endif ()

if (NOT TARGET glad)
    include(glad.cmake)
    set_target_properties(glad PROPERTIES FOLDER ${third_party_folder}/glad)
endif ()

if (NOT TARGET imgui)
    include(imgui.cmake)
    set_target_properties(imgui PROPERTIES FOLDER ${third_party_folder}/imgui)
endif ()

if (NOT TARGET glm)
    include(glm.cmake)
    set_target_properties(glm PROPERTIES FOLDER ${third_party_folder}/glm)
    #    option(GLM_ENABLE_CXX_20 "" ON)
    #    option(GLM_ENABLE_LANG_EXTENSIONS "" ON)
    #    option(GLM_ENABLE_FAST_MATH "" ON)
    #    add_subdirectory(glm-1.0.1)
    #    set_target_properties(glm PROPERTIES FOLDER ${third_party_folder}/glm)
endif ()

if (NOT TARGET stb_image)
    include(stb_image.cmake)
    set_target_properties(stb_image PROPERTIES FOLDER ${third_party_folder}/stb_image)
endif ()
